mvw.input_scale: Full repo; default test suite (vitest with TEST_SCOPE=node)
mvw.success_criteria: exit code 0, tests run (some may fail due to Node.js version compatibility)

environment.methodology: tutorial.md one-pass profiling; peaks from process-tree measurement (measure_mui_material-ui_v2.sh), RSS sampled every 0.2s for root and all child processes; MVW actually run (pnpm install + pnpm test:node). Used .pnpmfile.cjs to bypass engines.node checks.

static_triage.notes: React component library monorepo; pnpm workspace, lerna, vitest; no GPU, no large assets; pnpm/vitest spawn multiple Node.js workers.

peaks_observed.cpu_utilization_summary: build moderate-high (pnpm install with multiple workers), run high (vitest parallel test execution)

min_hardware.summary: 2 vCPU / 8 GB RAM / 2 GB disk, no GPU. Raw peaks (rounded up to SKU): build 0.28 GB RAM, run 5.52 GB RAM, disk 1.82 GB.
